oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gettysburg Bluegrass Festival at Granite Hill Campground
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: festivals; Bluegrass music; The Osborne Brothers; Martin, Jimmy;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Gettysburg Bluegrass Camporee with the Osborne Brothers, Jimmy Martin and the Sunny Mountain Boys with the Seldom Scene, the Country Gentlemen and others at the Granite Hill Campground on May 4-6. Poster features metal photoplates of the Osborne Brothers and Jimmy Martin. Purchase order 21146.
